description: Empowering artists with their own dedicated stations
name: YouPlay

brand.description:
YouPlay

Showcasing new music talent

Introducing YouPlay, a revolutionary platform from the fastest-growing radio platform, YouRadio. YouPlay is designed to liberate and empower artists with their very own radio station and showcase emerging talent to YouRadio listeners. Our goal is to make YouPlay a haven for talented up-and-coming artists, providing them with the freedom to showcase their unique sound and the control to shape their own musical journey while making a lasting impact on the music scene. YouPlay radio features a diverse range of artists across different genres, ensuring there's something new for every music lover.

The worldwide music industry appears to be solely focused on corporate revenue and shareholder value. Music companies are the stealth force driving the industry with a keen eye on profits rather than pure artistry. When you stream songs, an unacceptable percentage of the revenue goes directly to the record companies and multiple other parties. This financial model prioritises the interests of big corporations over those who create the content upon which they depend for their massive profits. In many cases, artists see only a fraction of the earnings from their work, with the majority being absorbed by their record labels. Furthermore, artists are often pressured to produce commercially viable material rather than exploring new or experimental sounds. This corporate need to generate consistent income leads to unadventurous, formulaic music where creativity takes a back seat to marketability.

The YouPlay business opportunity is ground-breaking for the music industry in that we provide a FREE platform, using the universally popular medium of radio, for artists to showcase their talent, control their careers and the option of monetisation to enable artists to generate their own revenue free from corporate interference.

If you’re an artist and would like your own YouPlay radio station, contact us today.
brand.meta_description: Empowering new artists with YouPlay: Create your own radio station, showcase talent, and control your musical journey
brand.name: YouPlay

stations.description:
Discover the distinctive voice and heartfelt songwriting of Alex Hart

Since releasing her acclaimed album Visions, Alex Hart has taken her live sound to the next level with the help of her stellar band: Adam Sweet (guitar), Paddy Blight (bass), and Joe Harris (drums). Their chemistry has sparked rave reviews across the UK, as Alex continues to captivate audiences with her blend of folk, soul, and pop.

A musical journey rooted in craft and collaboration

Spotted at just 18 by producer Neil Stainton, Alex honed her songwriting skills and released her debut album On This Day, co-written with Torbay musician Barney Dine. Their close creative partnership helped shape her unique sound and paved the way for years of gigging, recording, and growing as a musician. Alex’s collaboration with electronic duo Electronic Youth on a cover of Angie Stone’s I Wish I Didn’t Miss You hit No.2 on the Music Week Dance Charts and received airplay on BBC Radio 1, championed by Pete Tong. That breakout moment led to festival appearances and a support slot for Turin Brakes, catching the attention of OK!Good Records (US) and Right Track Records (UK), who quickly signed her.

Touring the world and working with legends

Alex Hart’s talent caught the eye of Jethro Tull’s Martin Barre, who invited her to tour internationally as a vocalist and multi-instrumentalist in his band. She's also a regular collaborator with Devon folk favourite Seth Lakeman, featuring heavily on his latest album. Their single Higher We Aspire earned support from BBC Radio 2, and Alex performed it live on BBC Breakfast TV. With regular tours across the UK, Europe, and the US, Alex Hart continues to evolve her sound while staying true to her roots.

2025 and beyond

Alex is currently working on new material set for release in 2025 and will continue touring with both Martin Barre and Seth Lakeman. Described by The Guardian as “set to make a global impact,” she’s an artist to watch. Listen to Alex Hart’s most personal work yet — Visions — available now on CD, Vinyl or digital download via Bandcamp or her official website.

Like what you hear? You can support Alex by sending a gift to her Paypal here: www.PayPal.me/alexhartmusic
stations.name: Alex Hart

stations.description:
YouPlay Chris Anderson

Non-stop Chris Anderson – Southern Rock Legend, Guitar Virtuoso & Songwriting Force

All Chris Anderson, All the Time – Only on YouPlay

Welcome to YouPlay Chris Anderson, the radio station dedicated to one of Southern Rock’s most influential and versatile artists. We play nothing but the music of Chris Anderson 24/7 – from his electrifying guitar work to his soulful songwriting, you’ll hear every era, every vibe, and every unforgettable riff. A veteran of the Southern Rock scene since the 1970s, Chris Anderson has worked with legendary acts like Outlaws, Grinderswitch, Lucinda Williams, The Allman Brothers, Blackhawk, Bad Company, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Hank Williams Jr, and Stephen Stills – to name just a few. His acclaimed debut album “Old Friend” has drawn comparisons to Stevie Ray Vaughan, Eric Clapton and Duane Allman, earning a rare five-star review from Rolling Stone and high praise from The New York Times as one of the “10 best albums you’ve never heard.” Based in Nashville, Tennessee, Anderson’s mastery across genres – from Country and Rock to Soul, Blues, Pop, and R&B – has made him a sought-after guitarist, producer and songwriter. As a longtime member of multi-platinum country group Blackhawk, his work continues to shape the sound of modern Southern Rock. Whether you’re a lifelong fan or discovering his music for the first time, YouPlay Chris Anderson is your go-to destination for the full spectrum of Chris Anderson songs, guitar solos, and timeless Southern Rock energy.

Stream YouPlay Chris Anderson – Where Great Music Never Stops
stations.name: Chris Anderson

stations.description: Eliza is a British singer-songwriter with a beautiful soulful voice. Her music blends elements of soul, R&B, and jazz to create a unique and sultry sound. Her lyrics are introspective and personal, exploring themes of love, heartbreak, and self-discovery. With a voice that's both powerful and emotive, Eliza's music is a treat for the senses. Her live performances are intimate and raw, with the singer delivering her soulful tunes with a sassy and confident energy. Whether she's performing in a small venue or a packed stadium, Eliza's music is guaranteed to leave you feeling moved and inspired. So, if you're a fan of soulful and introspective music, make sure you check out Eliza.
stations.name: Eliza

stations.description:
Composing her own music since she was just 10 Isobel Holly brings a talent and maturity that belies her age. Inspired by the likes Fleetwood Mac and Carole King, Isobel Holly has quickly found her own distinctive sound. Though originally from Bath, UK, Holly has found her home in the music scene of Nashville, Tennessee.

You can learn more about Isobel's music on her website at https://www.isobelholly.com/

stations.description:
Discover the heartfelt songwriting and musical craftsmanship of Mikerey, a talented artist blending country and pop into unforgettable melodies. YouPlay Mikerey is your exclusive station for his original country pop songs, now also featuring relaxing, smooth instrumental music — all streaming 24/7 with no interruptions.

Mikerey's musical journey started early, with formal piano lessons at age 7 and a deep dive into songwriting after receiving his first guitar at 10. Inspired by The Beatles, he developed a strong foundation in chords, melody, and composition. After playing cocktail jazz in London’s hotels and bars, he transitioned into a career writing and producing his own music, leading to his work being featured on TV shows and film productions worldwide.

Now, Mikerey is showcasing his country pop creations — songs filled with storytelling, emotion, and timeless melodies. Whether you're a fan of classic country, modern pop, or heartfelt singer-songwriter music, YouPlay Mikerey delivers an authentic, intimate listening experience.

Like what you hear? You can support Mikerey by buying a coffee here: https://buymeacoffee.com/mikerey
stations.name: Mikerey

Mimi's live performances are intimate and captivating, with the singer delivering her sassy tunes with a soulful energy. Whether she's performing in a small venue or a packed stadium, Mimi Webb's music is guaranteed to leave you feeling moved and inspired. So make sure you check out Mimi Webb.

stations.description:
Nyki Lindsay King, a solo artist hailing from Montreal, Canada, is a multi-talented musician who plays guitar and pens all his music and lyrics. Drawing inspiration from icons like Eddie Vedder, Kurt Cobain, and Chester Bennington, Nyki’s sound encompasses elements of Funk, Soul, R&B, and Reggae, creating a unique and captivating musical blend.

His musical journey began In 1983 under the guidance of his father, Eric George Lindsay, a Studio One reggae artist with the classic “Rasta Nah Run.” Nyki took the stage at just 7 years old with his brothers, performing as “The Kings Brothers.” They had popular performances in the 80s and shared the stage with Ken Boothe, Alton Ellis, John Holt, U-Roy, Paula Clarke and many others.

Nyki’s sound has been compared to bands like Linkin Park, Three Days Grace and Our Lady Peace – to name a few. But you’ll discover when you listen to several of his tracks that Nyki is an incredibly versatile artist with an array of different styles, each executed with skillfullness. Nyki writes songs about real-life situations in hopes of helping others through their struggles. He’s an artist full of talent and heart.
stations.name: Nyki Lindsay King

With a blend of pop, soul, and folk, His music is characterized by its introspective and emotional lyrics, as well as its smooth vocals and acoustic guitar. Sam's live performances are intimate and captivating, with the singer delivering his music with a soulful energy. Whether he's performing in a small venue or a packed festival, Sam's music is guaranteed to leave you feeling moved and inspired. So make sure you check out Sam Ryder.

stations.description:
Discover the extraordinary talent of Wally "Gator" Sirotich, an American composer, pianist, songwriter, and entertainer who has spent his life at the keys, backing some of the greatest musicians of our time. YouPlay Wally "Gator" Sirotich is your exclusive destination for his unique blend of blues, jazz, rock, and smooth piano compositions—all in one place, streaming 24/7 with no interruptions.

With an impressive career spanning decades, Wally has performed alongside icons like Robert Plant (Led Zeppelin), Dickey Betts (The Allman Brothers), Rick Danko (The Band), Bo Diddley, Rick Derringer, Mitch Ryder, Odetta, Richie Havens, and more. As a five-year member of the Toler Brothers Band, he shared the stage with "Dangerous" Dan Toler and Frankie Toler of the Gregg Allman Band, as well as Chris Anderson of The Outlaws. His live performances have taken him across the world, from Italy, Sardinia, Japan, and South Korea to Canada and across the USA.

Beyond his collaborations, Wally "Gator" Sirotich has an extensive solo career with eleven original albums, spanning everything from piano and Hammond B3 compositions to smooth jazz and heartfelt tributes. He has opened for legendary acts like Steppenwolf, The Marshall Tucker Band, The Outlaws, Molly Hatchet, Toto, and Levon Helm.

Whether you're a fan of classic rock, jazz, blues, or masterful piano compositions, YouPlay Wally "Gator" Sirotich brings you the best of an artist who has shaped the music world from behind the keys. Tune in now and experience the magic of a true musical storyteller.   

Like what you hear? You can support Wally by buying him a coffee here: https://buymeacoffee.com/pianowally8
stations.name: Wally Gator Sirotich - Piano
